resources.string: Your device doesn\'t support speech input
What do you want to share?
The playing notification provides actions for play/pause etc.
An empty playlist will be created. You can add songs later.
A playlist will be created and one song will be added to it.
A playlist will be created and %d songs will be added automatically.
Remove the song %1$s from the playlist?
Where do you want to search?
Do you want to remove this directory from the blacklist?
Do you want to remove this directory from the whitelist?
Do you want to clear the blacklist?
Do you want to clear the whitelist?
The app needs permission to access your device storage for playing music
You must grant permission to access external storage.
The app needs nearby devices permission to check for bluetooth devices
Permission to schedule exact alarms is required for the sleep timer to work properly
The app needs permission to access your device settings in order to set music as Ringtone
You must allow Booming Music to modify the system settings in order to set %s as your ringtone
%s is not listed in the media store.
Some files are not listed in the media store.
Added %1$d titles to the playing queue.
Set %s as your ringtone and as alarm alert
In most cases, Android automatically detects and indexes media files on your device, so manually scanning is usually unnecessary.
The title or artist is empty.
Failed to save cover to local storage

Some album covers (or all of them) might be protected by Copyright laws. You can not use such images for commercial or advertisement purposes. \n\nOnly you have total responsibility over your usage of saved album covers.
You have to select at least one category
You can\'t select more than five categories.
Open the app to see the full list
Couldn\'t not restore data. Verify backup file and retry.
There are no suggestions for you
Favors songs from your top artists.
Favors songs from your most played albums.
Gives priority to your favorite songs.
Prioritizes songs you haven\'t played in a while.
Favors songs recently added to your library.
Mix based on favorites, plays, and recency.
Select a file to save exported configurations.
Select a file containing Booming Music EQ presets.
Are you sure you want to reset the equalizer? \n\nThis will clear all your presets.
Please, enter a name for this preset.
That name is already in use.
Please, enter a new name for this preset.
Do you want to import synchronized LRC lyrics for %s?
Select a LRC file containing synced lyrics.
Booming Music couldn\'t find the lyrics for this song. Do you want to search manually?
Synced lyrics come from an LRC file. Changes will be saved directly to that file.
Embedded lyrics are synced. They will have higher priority than downloaded lyrics.
Sleep timer set for %d minutes from now.
Thanks to those who make Booming Music available in many languages.
Join the chat in Telegram and get informed about new releases and news.
You can contribute to the project by helping translate Booming Music into other languages.
Report bugs or request new features.
You can help this app grow if you share it with friends.
Hi. Check out Booming Music! The best app to listen local music on Android. You can download it from here: %s
You will be forwarded to the issue tracker website.
Booming Music requires permission to access these files. Please select the root folder where your music files are stored.
Change the app\'s theme and other visual settings.
Change the sound settings, Bluetooth headsets, etc.
Settings related to album and artists images.
Settings for playlists and exclusion/inclusion filters.
In-app language and other settings for advanced users.
Booming Music %s, touch for more info.
Configure visibility and order of library categories.
Go to the last opened page on launch.
Long-press any navigation bar tab to open the search screen.
Expand the Now Playing panel automatically after start playing a song.
Add extra controls for mini player
Swipe down the mini player to stop playback and clear playing queues.
Swipe left and right on album cover to skip between songs.
Defines how rounded the corners of the album art should appear.
Show song lyrics instead of cover when them are available.
It\'s played when opening the player panel.
Display extra info about the song, like bitrate, format, sampling rate, etc.
Select the extra info to display in the player panel.
Display remaining time instead of the song\'s duration.
Shows the Album-artist\'s name instead of Song-artist\'s name (if available).
Smooth transition between songs. Can cause playback issues on some devices.
Set volume level when ReplayGain is enabled.
When playing a song from the search screen, all other results will also be enqueued.
Shuffle mode will stay on when selecting a new list of songs.
If playback is paused, tapping Previous or Next buttons will start music.
Rewind the playing track to the start or move to previous track if the current one is in the beginning.
Resumes playback when headphone is connected.
Pauses playback when headphone is disconnected. Recommended.
Resumes playback when Bluetooth A2DP headset is connected.
Pauses playback when Bluetooth A2DP headset is disconnected. Recommended.
Always play audio in background regardless of anything else being played.
Pause playback on transient focus loss (i.e. notifications, incoming calls).
This may help to increase images quality but require more memory.
If the audio file does not contain an embedded cover. Images might take a bit more of time to load.
This depends on your metadata download policy.
Only lyrics downloaded by Booming Music. Does not affect lyrics embedded in ID3v2 tags or LRC files.
Select which actions should also apply to subfolders when performed on a folder.
Allows the application to record the songs you\'ve been listening to. If you disable it the entire history will be cleared.
Only the content of whitelisted folders is shown in your library.
The content of blacklisted folders is hidden from your library.
How many songs (at least) must have an artist to be shown in your library.
How many songs (at least) must have an album to be shown in your library.
How many seconds (at least) must last a song to be shown in your library.
Colors the notification in the album cover\'s vibrant color
Uses the current songs album cover as lockscreen wallpaper. May cause high memory usage. Varies with device.
Blurs the album cover on the lockscreen. Can cause problems with third party apps and widgets.
Create a file containing essential app data and save it to external storage.
Restore app data (and state) from a previous backup.
Extract the album color and apply it to some controls
Tint background, text, and controls with the album color
Use Material You tones based on the album color
Search for updates only when Wi-Fi is connected.
Please note that these updates are often very unstable and are intended for experienced users.
Sorry for the inconvenience. You can review the error report and restart the app.
